name: Star Dodge (Fab)
description:
Game

This is just a small game I quickly thought up to get used to using Unity. It's not really different to other games I've made in the past but I like the little score based games. It was fun using my hand drawn art instead of pixel art. My top score was 15 stars. See if you can beat it. The game is probably a little too hard.

Enjoy!

Controls

Arrow/WASD keys to turn and move.

Music

"Zazie" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
